dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, seriously, is running an illegal gambling business even that big of a deal? I mean, come on.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, seriously, is running an illegal gambling business even that big of a deal? I mean, come on.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, uh, apparently for Kazakhstan, it is. They just, you know, extradited someone from Azerbaijan over it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, uh, apparently for Kazakhstan, it is. They just, you know, extradited someone from Azerbaijan over it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A Kazakhstani citizen suspected of organizing an illegal gambling business has been extradited from Azerbaijan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Extradited? For gambling? That seems a bit much, doesn't it? Like, they sent a whole, what, team?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Extradited? For gambling? That seems a bit much, doesn't it? Like, they sent a whole, what, team?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, um, the General Prosecutor's Office and the Financial Monitoring Agency actually brought her back. With embassy support, even.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, um, the General Prosecutor's Office and the Financial Monitoring Agency actually brought her back. With embassy support, even.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: She was brought back to her homeland by officers of the General Prosecutor™s Office and the Financial Monitoring Agency (FMA), with support from the Kazakh Embassy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Financial monitoring? For, like, someone running a few card games in a back room? What made it so "illegal" anyway?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Financial monitoring? For, like, someone running a few card games in a back room? What made it so illegal anyway?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, no, it was a whole operation, Host_A. Set up in Almaty in 2023. And, like, they made a "particularly large profit."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, no, it was a whole operation, Host_A. Set up in Almaty in twenty twenty three. And, like, they made a particularly large profit.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the investigation, in 2023, she and her accomplices set up an illegal gambling operation in Almaty, generating a particularly large profit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Particularly large profit." Sure. But enough to, what, go into hiding and get put on an international wanted list? That just sounds dramatic.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Particularly large profit. Sure. But enough to, what, go into hiding and get put on an international wanted list? That just sounds dramatic.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yeah, um, she was on an international wanted list. That's why she was arrested in Baku, back in January.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yeah, um, she was on an international wanted list. That's why she was arrested in Baku, back in January.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After that, she went into hiding and was placed on an international wanted list. In January of this year, the suspect was arrested in Baku.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So they just, like, found her in Baku? And then Azerbaijan just handed her over, no questions asked?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So they just, like, found her in Baku? And then Azerbaijan just handed her over, no questions asked?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, no, it wasn't just handed over. It was, like, following a request from their General Prosecutor's Office. That's the normal process for extradition.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, no, it wasn't just handed over. It was, like, following a request from their General Prosecutor's Office. That's the normal process for extradition.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Following a request from the General Prosecutor™s Office, she was extradited to Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Normal process. Okay. But for this, she's, like, in jail now, right? And for how long? Is it, like, a slap on the wrist?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Normal process. Okay. But for this, she's, like, in jail now, right? And for how long? Is it, like, a slap on the wrist?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, not a slap on the wrist at all. She's in a pre-trial detention center in Almaty. And, um, the crime carries four to seven years imprisonment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, not a slap on the wrist at all. She's in a pre-trial detention center in Almaty. And, um, the crime carries four to seven years imprisonment.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: She is currently being held in a pre-trial detention center in Almaty. The crime carries a penalty of imprisonment ranging from four to seven years, along with the confiscation of assets.

dialogue_turns.tts_text: Four to seven years? Plus, they're taking her stuff, aren't they? Her assets? Is that really fair for, you know, gambling?
